articles.content: For perhaps the first time during the pandemic, Heinz Field actually felt like it had a full house in the first quarter of the Steelers' much-anticipated Wildcard playoff game against the Browns on S… [+3819 chars]

articles.title: The History Of The Maple Leafs vs. Canadiens Rivalry | Chronicles - SPORTSNET
articles.description: Sportsnet takes a look back at the history of the legendary Toronto Maple Leafs vs. Montreal Canadiens rivalry. ---------------------------------------------...
